summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 9th Avenue Northeast, from Ravenna Boulevard to East 65th Street; East 64th Street, from 8th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; East 63rd Street from 8th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; East 62nd Street from 8th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; 7th Avenue Northeast, from Ravenna Boulevard to East 65th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage and sub-drains for the property drainage of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3036 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
